phrases: Why could not you find it anywhere in Izumo?
Without any information about its form or properties,
You will bring the priestess Sanada took in to me!
Intimidate that disobedient Sanada while you are there, too!
Do you like this pink one or this teal one?
There are a whole bunch of other colors, too.
Do not you know what day it is?
I am supposed to celebrate the harvest with a dance!
I am just asking you to help me choose my outfit.
I thought it would be nice, too.
I do not care about her dance or festival.
I do not have time for this crap.
You have grown so much, I hardly recognized you.
I heard you got yourself a master.
What is a talented girl like you doing working for a crazy guy like him?
I went out for wool and came home shorn, I guess.
I tried to kill him in his sleep, but screwed up the job.
But he said he would hire me, so I defected.
Saizo, you have got to treat women better.
Do you need me to show you?
Ana, how did things look at the border?
There were rumors going around about an uwabami.
It is so big, it can swallow people and beasts whole.
Would Sasuke be fine on his own?
If he is not, he will let us know.
I am counting on you, Isanami.
We are grateful for another bountiful harvest.
Eat and drink your fill today.
He is oddly charming, is not he?
Saizo, you are scared, are not you?
Even though everyone yearns to find a master to serve, or something to protect.
I am happiest doing whatever I want.
People like you float away if they do not have anything to hold them down.
I have had enough of this.
I am not into festivals and dancing.
I am going to go stretch my legs.
I cannot let it get to me.
She is rather frantic, is not she?
It is novel, but it is not bad.
But you are the festival priestess.
I am finished dancing, and I want to always be with you.
You will only be a burden to Saizo if you cling to him like that.
I am going to go kill that uwabami.
I will be fine because you will protect me!
There is something scary over there.
That is what does not make sense.
I have not heard a single bird chirp all day.
It is pretty dark in here.
I could not sense its presence at all!
That uwabami was set to explode when it died.
Whoever was controlling it must be a hell of a puppeteer.
I cannot believe we have been buried alive together.
We will be together until our last breath.
Why are you always so optimistic?
I know I will be safe with you.
You are my one light in the darkness.
I faced so much difficulty and fear after I left Izumo.
You are the only one who extended a helping hand.
My turbulent emotions calmed in an instant.
I pass from darkness to darkness,
but I never reveal myself in the light.
You are dazzling in my eyes, Saizo.
You must have had nice parents.
They told me I was abandoned in front of the Izumo shrine as a baby.
He died protecting me in Izumo.
So you are the only one I can rely on, Saizo.
I told you, I do not care.
I am putting out the fire.
We will run out of air.
The smoke's flowing to the side.
If the air's flowing this way,
there might be an opening leading outside in this direction.
You mean we can get out?
If we can open a big enough hole.
we will be crushed and die together.
Come on, let us get out of here.
The smoke's getting in my eyes.
Where is the priestess of Izumo?
The uwabami was nothing more than a rumor?
My snake is rigged with explosives.
If you try to kill it,
you will destroy everything and everyone in the vicinity.
If you do not believe me, why do not you try it?
I will kill those who defile it.
There is no way I can just wait here.
Well, do not you have some poise.
You will lose your vision soon.
Did I get in your way?
I was just having some fun with this boy.
But now that I have found you,
I cannot let you get away with this.
Let us see if you can do something about it.
I do not require the assistance of an Iga.
I apologize, but I do not intend to let this fight drag on.
I have already wasted plenty of your time.
You finally realized why you are here?
I cannot see because of the smoke.
You will find an exit there.
You have done it now, boy.
You will not leave here alive.
You will be coming with me,
Unfortunately for you, you are not taking her anywhere.
I have no intention of losing.
Are you familiar with the expression pride goeth before a fall?
You really should read the Heike Monogatari.
Get away from the castle, quickly!
A couple of men tied up together is hardly an attractive sight.
How can you say that at a time like this?
Everyone is made it to safety.
You think you can do whatever you want?
You cannot evade what you cannot see.
That is what you call a feat of Marici.
I will simply cut them all down.
It is nothing more than a distraction.
Is this all the alleged prodigal ninja can do?
also known as Marici because no one is able to cut him.
I cannot tell you how many times I have heard the name.
Om Sumbha Nisumbha Hum Vajra Hum Phat.
Miss, you will be coming with me.
You are dazzling in my eyes, Saizo.
Let us be on our way.
I will not let you take her.
You do not know when to give up, do you?
Have you changed your mind about me?
Unfortunately, we will have to postpone this battle.
You are way too loud, monkey.
Perhaps you had too much to drink.
If you have trouble sleeping, I can help you.
If anything, I would like to use a lady's chest as a pillow.
What are you doing, old man?
You will get in the way if you sleep out in the hallway.
The next episode of Brave 10 is The Valley of Whirlwinds.
